mapper.insert: insert into promble (id, title, cate, keyword, createtime, creater, top, status, accept, answers, sviews, collections, comments, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{top,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accept,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{answers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sviews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collections,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comments,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
